YelpBusinessRecord.name: Bouley

reviews.excerpt: Absolutely delicious ! Loved every bite I had. We were a bit nervous at first because we had heard mixed reviews. But when we sat down we were extremely...

Sometimes when you go for Michelin's lunch, it is not uncommon to say "meh, that was a different thing from what I had in dinner".

But here, you are...
The finest in fine dining.  The dishes go from excellent to outstanding.  The desserts are super exceptional.

YelpBusinessRecord.name: Blue Hill

reviews.excerpt: Far and away one of the best restaurants in the city. They're farmer's feast is an semi-annual tradition for me, and every time i get it i am never...
The ambiance: Dimly lit, classy, but sort of like a hotel restaurant, if you know what I mean. The 2-tops in the back, where we sat, are a bit cramped....
Dinner here was lovely. The ambiance is relaxed and intimate. I love this place's concept of bringing farm fresh ingredients straight to the table. The farm...

YelpBusinessRecord.snippet_text: this place blew my mind, and in the best possible way. truly the best dining experience i've had in new york. the food is farm fresh. i suppose thats the...

Quickly becoming my favorite restaurant in NYC due to its low key crowd, quaint decor, lovely hostess and great food. Granted they cooked my filet mignon a...
As a French transplant in NYC, I am always looking for great quality traditional French food!  I have been to La Sirene several times over the last 4 years,...

YelpBusinessRecord.name: Gramercy Tavern

reviews.excerpt:
Yup.  
Exactly what one would expect, pretty much perfection.  Utilizing the best, freshest foods available.  Vibrant colors, flavors, and ugh it's all just...
all time favorite spot!!!!!! try the rack of lamb, it is absolutely delicious. all of the desserts are phenomenal but the chocolate torte blows everything...
This place is amazing!   The menu is VERY pricey but the food is worth it.   The drinks were particularly delicious.  I tried the rickshaw (I would...

YelpBusinessRecord.snippet_text: Happy Birthday to me! I don't know about you, but my friends and I always end up celebrating my birthday in what I call birthday week/month...aka massive...

reviews.excerpt: I've created a yelp account today in order to write this review. I've considered Yasuda one of the best sushi restaurants in NY. We had a reservation...
best sushi.
One thing about this place - very, very expensive though does tend to fill up with the Manhattan lunch crowd. I sat at the bar and ordered the omakase. Cost...

YelpBusinessRecord.snippet_text:
it's all been said already. 

everything was fantastic - beyond fantastic.  everything melted in my mouth.

must. go. back.

reviews.excerpt: We dined here last fall before seeing "The Book of Mormon." We ordered off the theater pre-fixe menu.  Food was excellently prepared, but I was most...
So so so snub place!!! Unbelievable!!! Thought it may happen only in Paris! Small group if old men tries to show first class but...!!! Food is awful and not...
Jacket required ??  For the prices they charge they should give me a new suit !! This place is insanely expensive and although we went for a very special...

reviews.excerpt: Absolutely flawless dinner. The food, service, and ambiance were exceptional. We opted for the 8 course tasting with wine pairing. They were very...

Very classy restaurant. Even when you walk in you can feel the Classy vibe.
waiters / Managers are very professional and notice you in details.
Great wine...
I came here last Friday with my boyfriend to celebrate our 3 year anniversary. I was a little apprehensive that we might be slighted because we are in our...

YelpBusinessRecord.name: Jean-Georges

reviews.excerpt: I am glad that I chose Jean George to end my NYC dining experience this year.  I am impressed mostly by the service.  Unlike other Michelin 3 stars...
Don't get me wrong...the food here is very good.  But for a Michelin 3-Star restaurant where I am spending hundreds of dollars per person, I expect more...

After a 2 year hiatus, I came back to visit NYC, and no trip is complete without a fine dining trip to Jean-Georges.

The menu had completely changed, the...
